lenders.name: DANIEL
lenders.loan_because:
I am mr.daniel d.bas from municipal of abra de ilog ,province of occidental mindoro philippines .before my job is missionary .our community composed of 2000 family majority of the people are Mangyan tribe  a large minority group  found in the island of mindoro.since i left mission work  i start doing little business such as farming & selling fruits .but it cannot meet for my growing  family needs . so i decided  to put up some source of income that can help my family & community as well .I am also one of the leader in our community,  i involve in community development .because  mangyan tribe are very difficult people they are consider poorest of the poor  their income rely only in planting rise in rainy season (JUNE -September )after that  they waiting for 4 months before harvest season (Novebmer -December )in our place there is no other means of income  only when they go to mountain and hunting for wild animals and getting rootcrafts as their food.now our goverment make some restriction  on hunting wild animals  due to endagared animals, so now they have no other source of income .so i decided to teach them other means of living and to be a model to the community as well .my opinion the best source of income is chicken poultry and hog raising .because after planting rice ,while they are waiting for harvest.there are alternative to get money for their daily needs .so this is my main reason  for applaying  for financial assistance  to your company KIRVA . i am optimistic that you can help my family and community as well .thank you very much and more power to your company...

Sincerely yours MR.DANIEL D, BAS    OCCIDENTAL MINDORO PHILLIPINES
lenders.occupational_info: I like to a be model in our community by helping them and teach them to be productive person  and self reliance in their life  .someday to be sucessfull and never asking for help to anybody  for their daily needs.
